questions: Does the image depict an open ancient book with yellowed pages? Answer with yes or no.
Are the pages of the book tattered at the edges? Answer with yes or no.
Is the book resting on a wooden table? Answer with yes or no.
Is there densely packed ancient text on the left page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the right page show a miniature scene with a courtyard and a blooming cherry blossom tree? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals falling in the scene depicted on the right page? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a woman in a pink Hanfu standing on the grass in the miniature scene? Answer with yes or no.
Is the woman holding a broom and sweeping the fallen petals? Answer with yes or no.
Does the courtyard background include a traditional Chinese building with red pillars and blue tiles? Answer with yes or no.
Is the courtyard surrounded by small trees and rock decorations? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a faint halo around the pages enhancing the three-dimensional effect? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals scattered on the table in front of the book? Answer with yes or no.
Is the background soft beige, creating an atmosphere full of ancient poetic charm and historical feel? Answer with yes or no.
Are the details exquisite and the colors soft, showcasing the weathered feel of the ancient book and the tranquil beauty of the courtyard? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image shows an open book with pages that appear old and slightly yellowed.
no The edges of the pages do not appear to be tattered; they seem intact.
no The book is not resting on a wooden table; it appears to be supported by an unseen surface beneath it.
yes The left page has densely packed, detailed text resembling ancient script.
yes The right page features a miniature scene depicting a courtyard with a blooming cherry blossom tree.
yes There are visible cherry blossom petals falling in the scene on the right page.
yes A woman wearing what appears to be a pink Hanfu is standing on the grass within the miniature scene.
no The woman is not holding a broom and sweeping fallen petals; she seems to be interacting with a cage or similar object.
yes In the background of the courtyard, there is a traditional Chinese building with red pillars and blue tiles.
yes Small trees and rock decorations surround the courtyard as part of the miniature scene.
yes There appears to be a faint glow or halo effect around the pages, enhancing their three-dimensional appearance.
yes Cherry blossom petals are indeed scattered on the surface in front of the book.
yes The background has a soft beige tone that contributes to the ancient and poetic feeling.
yes The image's details are exquisite, and the colors are soft, effectively conveying the aged look of the book and the serene atmosphere of the courtyard.
